file.name: administration-course-proposals.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Administration Course Proposals API
  description: "Administration Course Proposals API"
  contact:
    email: anton93lev@gmail.com
  version: 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
tags:
  - name: Administration Course Proposals API
    description: Administration Course Proposals API
paths:
  '/administration/course-proposals/{uuid}/approval-status':
    put:
      tags:
        - Administration Course Proposals API
      summary: Approve Course Proposal
      description: Approve Course Proposal
      operationId: approveCourseProposal
      parameters:
        - name: uuid
          in: path
          description: Course Proposal UUID.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Course Proposal approved.
        '400':
          description: Course Proposal was already approved.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '404':
          description: Course Proposal not found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
    delete:
      tags:
        - Administration Course Proposals API
      summary: Decline Course Proposal
      description: Decline Course Proposal
      operationId: declineCourseProposal
      parameters:
        - name: uuid
          in: path
          description: Course Proposal UUID.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
          x-example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Course Proposal declined.
        '400':
          description: Course Proposal was already approved.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '404':
          description: Course Proposal not found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
  '/administration/course-proposals':
    get:
      tags:
        - Administration Course Proposals API
      summary: List course proposals
      description: List course proposals
      operationId: listCourseProposals
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Course Proposals returned.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ListCourseProposalsResponse'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    ListCourseProposalsResponse:
      description: List of Course Proposals response model
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          uuid:
            type: string
            description: Course UUID
            format: uuid
            example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
          status:
            type: string
            description: status
            example: APPROVED
            enum: [WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL, DECLINED, APPROVED]
    RestApiError:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          example: ErrorCode
          description: Error code.
        details:
          type: array
          description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiError'
        innererror:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InnerError'
        message:
          type: string
          example: Validation issues
          description: A human-readable representation of the error.
        target:
          type: string
          example: field
          description: The target of the error.
      title: RestApiError
      description: REST API Error.
    RestApiErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiError'
      title: RestApiErrorResponse
      description: REST API Error Response. Full description about error response is represented in https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses
    InnerError:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          example: ErrorCode
          description: Error code.
        innererror:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InnerError'
      title: InnerError
      description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.
